    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_114654</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_114654</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Extrinsic n-type semiconductor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Äußerer Ntyp Halbleiter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">N-type extrinsèque semi-conducteur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">N-tipo extrinsic semicondutor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">N-tipo estrinseco semiconduttore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξωγενής ημιαγωγός ν-τύπων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">N-tipo extrínseco semiconductor</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that doping silicon with a pentavalent phosphorus atom introduces a free electron. Semiconductors with extra electron charge carriers are called n-type semiconductors.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">charge carrier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Doping</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">extrinsic semiconductor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">free electron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">n-type semiconductor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pentavalent phosphorus atom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Silicon</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß dem das 
Lackieren des Silikons mit einem fünfwertigen Phosphoratom ein freies
Elektron einführt. Halbleiter mit Extraelektronladung 
Fördermaschinen werden Ntypen Halbleiter genannt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que cela le dopage du 
silicium avec un atome pentavalent de phosphore présente un électron
libre. Des semi-conducteurs avec les porteurs supplémentaires 
de charge d'électron s'appellent le n-type semi-conducteurs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que isso doping o 
silicone com um átomo pentavalent do phosphorus introduz um elétron 
livre. Os semicondutores com os portadores extra da carga do 
elétron são chamados n-tipo semicondutores.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che quello verniciare
il silicone con un atomo pentavalente del fosforo introduce un 
elettrone libero. I semiconduttori con gli elementi portanti 
supplementari della carica dell'elettrone sono chiamati n-tipo 
semiconduttori.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η νάρκωση του πυριτίου
με ένα pentavalent άτομο φωσφόρου εισάγει ένα ελεύθερο 
ηλεκτρόνιο. Οι ημιαγωγοί με τους πρόσθετους μεταφορείς 
δαπανών ηλεκτρονίων καλούνται ημιαγωγούς ν-τύπων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que eso el doping del 
silicio con un átomo pentavalent del fósforo introduce un electrón 
libre. Los semiconductores con los portadores adicionales de la 
carga del electrón se llaman n-tipo semiconductores.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ladung Fördermaschine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lackieren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">äußerer Halbleiter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">freies Elektron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ntyp Halbleiter</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
